other_tests.findings: Normal results after intravenous injection of 18F-FDG.
Elevated serum phenylalanine level and elevated phenylalanine:tyrosine ratio.

other_tests.procedure_name: Therapeutic trial with levodopa and carbidopa
other_tests.findings: Marked improvement in her symptoms within 24 hours.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Continued improvement in function, with only a trace of dystonia after three years.

other_tests.findings: Identified a two-nucleotide deletion in exon 6 of the GCH1 gene.
